overview: Based on a true story, the ﬁlm takes its inspiration from the opposition protest Xu Tong’s Wheat Harvest met. The screening of a documentary about sex workers brings the heroine lots of troubles. A new NGO social worker helps her out and ﬁghts for her rights. However, their relationship becomes more and more personal. In the hot summer, they are alone in a cramped room...
title: Miss A
